General.Name: Safe and Green Development Corporation
General.Description: Safe and Green Development Corporation engages in real property development. The company operates through two segments, Real Estate Development and Technology. It is involved in direct acquisition and indirect investment in properties to be developed in the future into green single or multi-family projects. The company was formerly known as SGB Development Corp. and changed its name to Safe and Green Development Corporation in December 2022. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida. Safe and Green Development Corporation is a subsidiary of Safe & Green Holdings Corp.
General.Address: 100 Biscayne Blvd, Miami, FL, United States, 33132
